title: Game Crashes Computer
body: For some reason, whenever I enter a game. The sound becomes distorted, then not long after my whole computer would freeze and I would have to force shut down my computer to get it working again. I never had this problem before and it seemed to happen after the new window 10 update(Not exactly sure tho). Please help

replies.body:
I had the same problem with the new Windows 10 update!

if you right click the League application and select "Test Compatibility" it will run a diagnostic and fix the problem for you!

:)

A recent windows 10 update made the Xbox game bar act wonky with league, causing some players to freeze and experience weird noises.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you still have issues!

I'm having the exact same issue. Everything up to entering Summoner's Rift works/sounds fine. Once I enter the map the sound becomes distorted (like buzzing) and my computer will eventually crash and require a restart. Updating all drivers and a fresh reinstall of Lol haven't helped. 
Every other game I play works fine.
Help please

Edit- It looks like I fixed the problem using the instructions here  http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/2x7Qphng-game-crash
I had initially just removed the xbox app which did nothing. It seemed to fix the problem once I disabled the game bar thing in the registry. How annoying.
I have an similar problem. Just after the loading Screen, in the beginning of a Match my computer crashes and turns off..
Mine doesn't close right after, however it freezes and requires me to force shut down for it to work again.
